channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: Thailand bans meme coins and NFTs as part of crypto crackdown
item.description: Thailand has implemented a ban on meme coins, NFTs and social coins as part of its ongoing regulatory action against crypto trading.

item.title: The Morning After: Microsoft's big E3 Xbox showcase
item.description: Today’s headlines: China's Mars rover took a selfie, Everything from Microsoft’s Xbox showcase at E3 2021, and ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ is your next Marvel videogame.

item.title: Apple Boot Camp update finally adds better trackpad support for Windows
item.description: Apple has added support for Windows Precision Touchpad drivers to its latest version of Boot Camp, addressing a big issue with Windows 10 Mac installations.

item.title: Google's Workplace suite is now free and available to anyone
item.description: Google is opening up Workspace to all users with a Google account and improving some features.

item.title: VR Nerf gun battles are coming to Oculus Quest next year
item.description: 'Nerf Ultimate Championship' is a new team-based virtual reality shooter for Oculus.

item.title: Volkswagen supplier breach may affect up to 3.3 million customers
item.description: Volkswagen has revealed that information about 3.3 million customers and prospective buyers was exposed after a supplier left the data unsecured online.

item.title: Amazon is offering two Echo Dots for $50 in early Prime Day deal
item.description: Amazon is offering deals on two Echo and two Echo Dot speakers as part of an early Prime Day offer.

item.title: Amazon's 2nd-gen Echo Buds drop to $80 in early Prime Day deal
item.description: The true wireless earbuds are on sale for the first time, with or without the wireless charging case.

item.title: The first-gen Echo Show 5 drops down to $45 ahead of Prime Day
item.description: That matches the device's lowest price to date.

item.title: Hand-drawn adventure game 'Minute of Islands' gets a surprise E3 release
item.description: At E3 this year, Studio Fizbin has announced a release date for 'Minute of Islands'. It's available on PC, PlayStation and Nintendo Switch right now.

item.title: A 'Slime Rancher' sequel is coming to Xbox Series X and PC in 2022
item.description: 'Slime Rancher 2' will bring a cute, open-world life simulator to Xbox Series X and PC in 2022.

item.title: Apple was told to quietly supply data on Trump's White House counsel in 2018
item.description: Apple was quietly subpoenaed for information on Trump's White House counsel, Don McGahn, and wasn't allowed to talk about it.

item.title: 'Babylon's Fall' will put a co-op twist on the PlatinumGames formula
item.description: Surprise! Babylon's Fall is an online RPG.

item.title: The first six 'Final Fantasy' games are getting 'pixel perfect' remakes
item.description: While this isn't quite what we've seen already with more recent Final Fantasy titles, Square Enix is giving the first six games in the RPG series a 'pixel remaster' treatment.

item.title: 'Stranger of Paradise Final Fantasy Origin' is a violent spin-off from the 'Nioh' team
item.description: Team Ninja and Tetsuo Nomura aren't pulling any punches.

item.title: 'Life is Strange: True Colors' somehow makes empathy a cool superpower
item.description: his time around, you play as 21-year-old Alex Chen, who’s moved to Haven Springs in Colorado to reunite with her brother Gabe. According to the new E3 trailer, Alex seems to be amazed by the life Gabe has made for himself, and the warm characters that live in this small mountain town. But this is LIS, and tragedy is usually only a few narrative beats away. Gabe mysteriously passes away, and True Colors focuses on Alex’s efforts to figure out what happened and what was responsible for Gabe’s death. Oh and she has some high-level empath talents that will help her on the way.

item.title: Time-loop thriller 'Twelve Minutes' arrives August 19th on Xbox and PC
item.description: 'Twelve Minutes' comes to Xbox and PC on August 19th, complete with James McAvoy, Daisy Ridley and Willem Dafoe in the cast.

item.title: ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ is more 'Deus Ex' than 'Avengers'
item.description: The next Square Enix Marvel game, Guardians of the Galaxy, has just been announced for an October 26th release. This time Eidos-Montréal is taking the reins and leading the partnership in a very different direction.

item.title: 'Guardians of the Galaxy' hits Xbox, PlayStation and PC on October 26th
item.description: It's a narrative, third-person, action-adventure title from the Deus Ex folks.

item.title: The Xbox Mini Fridge will keep your gamer juice cool this holiday season
item.description: It's not yet clear whether the Xbox Series X-style appliance will be a giveaway or a thing you can buy.

item.title: ‘Fallout 76’ is headed to Fallout 3’s Pittsburgh in 2022
item.description: Get ready to return to The Pitt.

item.title: 'Redfall' is an open-world vampire shooter from the studio behind 'Dishonored'
item.description: Arkane and Bethesda have unveiled 'Redfall,' an open-world vampire shooter for Xbox Series X and PC due in 2022.

item.title: 'Forza Horizon 5' will take players to Mexico on November 9th
item.description: Microsoft will release Forza Horizon 5, the next-entry its long-running open world racing series, on November 9th.

item.title: 'Microsoft Flight Simulator' touches down on Xbox Series X/S on July 27th
item.description: A free 'Top Gun Maverick' expansion is coming in November.

item.title: 'The Outer Worlds 2' is a thing that exists
item.description: Worth it to watch the trailer alone.
